==Trivia==
* In Chinese, the soundtrack name {{Lang|mini=1|zh=尘世闲游|zh_rm=Chénshì Xiányóu}} has also been translated as Vago Mundo as a title for Zhongli. It means "leisurely roaming the mortal world."
